## Installation

### Windows
1. Download `RAGKIT-Desktop_{VERSION}_x64-setup.exe` or `.msi`
2. Run the installer
3. Launch RAGKIT Desktop

### macOS
1. Download `RAGKIT-Desktop_{VERSION}_x64.dmg` (Intel) or `_aarch64.dmg` (Apple Silicon)
2. Open the `.dmg` and drag the app to Applications
3. First run: right click > Open

### Linux
AppImage:
```bash
chmod +x RAGKIT-Desktop_{VERSION}_amd64.AppImage
./RAGKIT-Desktop_{VERSION}_amd64.AppImage
```

Debian/Ubuntu:
```bash
sudo dpkg -i RAGKIT-Desktop_{VERSION}_amd64.deb
```

## Quick Start

### With Ollama (recommended)
1. Install Ollama: https://ollama.ai/
2. Launch RAGKIT Desktop
3. The app downloads models automatically

### With cloud providers
1. Get an API key (OpenAI, Anthropic, etc.)
2. Open Settings
3. Configure the provider and API key

## Documentation
- Full install guide: INSTALL.md

## Notes
- Data is stored locally in `~/.ragkit/`
- Report issues at https://github.com/henribesnard/ragkit/issues
